Data Fields
am_hal_bootrom_helper_struct Struct Reference
mcu » apollo330P » Bootrom Functionality

Structure of pointers to helper functions invoking flash operations. More...

Detailed Description

Structure of pointers to helper functions invoking flash operations.

The functions we are pointing to here are in the Apollo 4 integrated BOOTROM.

#include <am_hal_bootrom_helper.h>
